description: Shan Korma Masala 50g is a premium blend of carefully selected spices designed to create an authentic and flavorful Korma curry. The vibrant orange and gold packaging immediately communicates the rich and aromatic nature of the contents within. This 50g pack is perfect for smaller households or for those wanting to try this exceptional blend before committing to a larger size. Each spice is meticulously sourced and expertly blended to ensure a consistent and highquality taste experience every time you cook. The blend includes a delightful mix of warming spices such as turmeric and cumin, complemented by the subtle sweetness of coriander and the gentle heat of chilies. This ensures a balanced and complex flavor profile that is both satisfying and delicious. The convenient resealable pouch keeps the spices fresh and fragrant, preserving their quality and ensuring you get the most out of every use.

Shan Nihari Masala 50g is a premium blend of authentic spices meticulously crafted to deliver the rich and aromatic flavor of traditional Nihari. The vibrant red and gold packaging immediately conveys the quality and intensity of the spices within. This convenient 50g pack is perfect for home cooks looking to create restaurantquality Nihari without the hassle of sourcing and blending individual spices. Each ingredient is carefully selected for its potency and freshness ensuring a consistently delicious result every time. Our commitment to quality means you can confidently create a Nihari that is both flavorful and deeply satisfying. The easytouse format simplifies the cooking process allowing you to focus on the other elements of your meal preparation. Experience the difference that highquality spices make in your culinary creations.

This Nihari Masala is more than just a spice blend it is a shortcut to culinary excellence.

NATIONAL Garlic Powder 50g is a premium quality garlic powder perfect for adding a robust garlic flavor to your favorite dishes. This 50 gram container features a vibrant yellow label with clear product information and the NATIONAL brand logo prominently displayed. The packaging is designed for easy storage and dispensing ensuring freshness is maintained. Our garlic powder is made from carefully selected garlic bulbs ensuring a consistent and strong flavor profile that elevates any recipe. Its a versatile ingredient ideal for soups stews sauces rubs marinades and countless other culinary creations. We use a gentle drying process that preserves the natural flavor and aroma of the garlic without any artificial additives or preservatives. This ensures a superior taste and quality you can trust.

This versatile spice offers significant benefits for home cooks and professional chefs alike.

Shan Karahi Fry Gosht Masala 50g is a premium blend of authentic spices designed to create a rich and flavorful Karahi Gosht dish at home. The vibrant red and gold packaging showcases the highquality ingredients within. This convenient 50g pack is perfect for a single serving or a small family meal, offering exceptional value and ease of use. The blend includes a carefully selected mix of chilies for a delightful heat, aromatic spices like coriander and cumin for depth of flavor, and other secret ingredients for a truly authentic taste. Enjoy the convenience of preparing a restaurantquality Karahi Gosht without the hassle of sourcing and grinding individual spices. This masala is a musthave for any spice lover seeking to elevate their cooking experience.

This versatile spice blend is incredibly easy to use. Simply add it to your favorite Karahi Gosht recipe following the instructions provided on the packaging for optimal results.
